alert.note: Alert for Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 5:38PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Duval County through 615 PM EDT... At 538 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cecil Field, or 11 miles northwest of Orange Park, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Normandy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
